content: the sweet stripey dreams is a beautifully textured and reversible crochet baby blanket that is perfect for baby boys and girls the mini bean crochet stitch along with the rugby-inspired stripes makes this blanket a superbly unique and modern crochet baby blanket **this pattern has been tested ** **sizes** one size - 28 inches long x 24 5 inches wide baby blanket size customization questions are welcome via email or ravelry mail **skill level** easy/intermediate - advanced beginner **recommended yarn** caron simply soft 630 yards / 576 meters caron simply soft party 164 yards / 149 meters **hook** 5 mm crochet hook **notions** yarn needles scissors **gauge** 8 mini bean sts x 14 row = 4 inches x 4 inches **finished dimensions** 28 inches long x 24 5 inches wide **terms to know** chain half_double_crochet mini bean stitch
